title: Ovvoru Pookalume Lyrics Autograph
stanzas:
nambikkai enbadhu
vaendum nam vazhvil.
latchiyam nichayam
vellum, oru naalil

maname o maname
nee maarividu
malaiyo adhu paniyo
nee modhi vidu.

ullam endurm eppodhum
udaindhu poga koodaadhu
enna indha vazhkai endru
ennam thondra koodathu

endha manaithan nenjukul
kaayam illai sollungal
kaala pokkil
kaayamellaam maraindhu
pogum maayangal..

yaarukillai poraattam
kannil enna neerottam
oru kanavu kandaal
adhai dhinam muandraal
oru naalil
nijamaagum

maname o maname
nee maarividu
malaiyo adhu paniyo
nee modhi vidu.

avamaanam padu thozhvi
ellaame uravaagum
thozhvi indri
varalaaraa
thukkam enna en thozha

maname o maname
nee maarividu
malaiyo adhu paniyo
nee modhi vidu.

nambikkai enbadhu
vaendum nam vazhvil.
latchiyam nichayam
vellum, oru naalil

maname o maname
nee maarividu
malaiyo adhu paniyo
nee modhi vidu.
